vsParam:
Yeah, now we can rest assured?
So, let's go back to Rose Hip!

Rose Hip, we're back!
And all the monsters have been defeated!

Good job.
No one got hurt?

No, thanks for the concern.
About all the crazy monsters...
Maybe it's because of that dragon that descended on Bressisle?

Yeah, very likely. A few days before,
I received a witness report on a giant dragon.

After that, the monsters got crazy one after another.
Maybe they're bewitched by the dragon.
You haven't received any witness reports since then?

No, maybe it's left here.
Or, it has settled down somewhere else...

We want to track the dragon, but these monsters keep us occupied.
So I'm sorry, I have no more information for you...

I see...
Hmm... We couldn't even locate the dragon...

I'll keep gathering information.
And I'll keep the Academy updated when we find anything new.

OK! Thank you, Rose Hip!
We should go back to the Academy now.

Oh, right.
Mimi, what are you going to do next?

Do you even need to ask?
I'm definitely going to kill the dragon.

Why are you so surprised? I could prove how powerful I am and
polish my family's reputation as long as I take down that dragon.

It doesn't matter that this is not even my world. This may
never happen again, so how could I afford to miss it?
It's too reckless to do this by yourself!

Yeah... Yeah right!
Let's try our best together, OK?

Come on, I don't think you know how powerful I am.
It's just a dragon, I can deal with it by myself...

Not necessary.
I can do it on my own...

Gosh!
Why... Why did you scream all of a sudden?

Mimi, you'll get yourself wounded again
if you keep being this reckless!

You're not allowed to do anything on your own!
No~~ Way! You hear me!?

All... All right!
I got your point, relax!

Ah... Anis won't listen to anyone
when she got this excited. Haha...

Sigh...
Fine, I'll give you a hand.

You'd like to give us a hand!?
Great, it's such a relief with your help, Mimi!

I... I just appreciate that [px] made medicine for me.
So I want to return the favor!

So let's make sure to win as I'm part of this now,
otherwise, I'll kick your ass. Understood!?
Great~! Hee hee, we got another reliable comrade, [px]!
